sqlMap.select:
select id, classification_id, name, plan_explain, banner_img_url, plan_img_url, reminder, weight, status, create_dt, delete_status, wx_share_url, wx_share_content, goods_category_id from t_healthy_plan
order by $orderByClause$
limit $pageInfo.start$ ,$pageInfo.pageSize$

SELECT thpc.id as tid,sum(tg.app_price*100) as ap,sum(tg.wap_price*100) as wp,sum(tg.price*100) as p from t_healthy_plan_combination as thpc LEFT JOIN t_healthy_plan_goods as thpg ON thpc.id=thpg.relation_id LEFT JOIN t_goods as tg ON tg.id=thpg.goods_id where thpg.type = 2 AND thpc.plan_id= #id# and thpc.delete_status=0 and thpc.status=1 GROUP BY thpc.id

SELECT thps.id as tid,tg.id as gid,tg.app_price,tg.wap_price,tg.type,tg.stock,tg.app_status,tg.wap_status from t_healthy_plan_symptom as thps LEFT JOIN t_healthy_plan_goods as thpg ON thps.id=thpg.relation_id LEFT JOIN t_goods as tg ON tg.id=thpg.goods_id where thpg.type = 1 AND thps.plan_id=#id#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT tg.id, tg.abbreviation_picture, tgp.price AS app_price, wap_t.price AS wap_price, tgp.`status`, tg.price, tg.goods_name, tg.short_name, tg.main_title, thpg.weight from t_healthy_plan_goods as thpg LEFT JOIN t_goods as tg ON thpg.goods_id = tg.id LEFT JOIN t_goods_price AS tgp ON tgp.goods_id = tg.id AND tgp.platform_type = '111yao' AND tgp.price_type = 'app' LEFT JOIN t_goods_price AS wap_t ON wap_t.goods_id = tg.id AND wap_t.platform_type = '111yao' AND wap_t.price_type = 'wap' where 1=1
thpg.relation_id = #id#
thpg.type = #type#
ORDER BY thpg.weight DESC ) AS tt WHERE 1 = 1 AND tt.`status` = 1

SELECT t.id, t.package_name, t.comment_content, p.real_name, p.head_url, p.work_year FROM t_healthy_plan_combination AS t LEFT JOIN t_physician AS p ON p.id = t.pharmacist_id AND t.pharmacist_id IS NOT NULL WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.STATUS = 1 AND t.delete_status = 0
t.plan_id = #id#
ORDER BY t.weight DESC

SELECT id,name,symptom_explain,banner_img_url,weight,type from t_healthy_plan_symptom where 1=1
plan_id = #id#
ORDER BY weight DESC

SELECT thp.id,thp.name,thp.plan_explain,thp.banner_img_url,thp.reminder,thp.status, thp.goods_category_id, (SELECT tcc.classification_name FROM t_healthy_plan_classification AS tcc WHERE tcc.id = thp.classification_id) AS cname, thp.wx_share_url, thp.wx_share_content from t_healthy_plan as thp where 1=1 AND thp.goods_category_id IS NOT NULL AND (SELECT tcc.classification_name FROM t_healthy_plan_classification AS tcc WHERE tcc.id = thp.classification_id) is NOT NULL
thp.id = #id#
thp.create_dt >= #beginDate#
thp.create_dt <= #endDate#
limit $offSet$ ,$pageSize$

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total from t_healthy_plan as thp where 1=1
thp.id = #id#
thp.create_dt >= #beginDate#
thp.create_dt <= #endDate#

select * from (SELECT t.id, t.`name`, t.weight, t.`status`, t4.classification_name, group_concat(t3.goods_name separator ';') as goodsName, group_concat(t3.goodsno separator ';') as goodsno FROM t_healthy_plan t, t_healthy_plan_symptom t1, t_healthy_plan_goods t2, t_goods t3, t_healthy_plan_classification t4 where t.id = t1.plan_id and t.classification_id = t4.id and t1.id = t2.relation_id and t2.goods_id = t3.id and t1.type =1 and t.delete_status =0
t.classification_id= #classificationId#
t.status= #status#
t.`name` like '%$planName$%'
t.`status` = #planStatus#
GROUP BY t.id,t.`name`,t.weight,t.`status`,t4.classification_name ORDER BY t.weight DESC ) AS tt where 1=1
tt.goodsName like '%$goodsName$%'
tt.goodsno like '%$goodsno$%'
ORDER BY tt.weight DESC limit $pageInfo.start$ ,$pageInfo.pageSize$

select count(*) from (SELECT t.id, t.`name`, t.weight, t.`status`, t4.classification_name, group_concat(t3.goods_name separator ';') as goodsName, group_concat(t3.goodsno separator ';') as goodsno FROM t_healthy_plan t, t_healthy_plan_symptom t1, t_healthy_plan_goods t2, t_goods t3, t_healthy_plan_classification t4 where t.id = t1.plan_id and t.classification_id = t4.id and t1.id = t2.relation_id and t2.goods_id = t3.id and t1.type =1 and t.delete_status =0
t.status= #status#
t.classification_id= #classificationId#
t.`name` like '%$planName$%'
t.`status` = #planStatus#
GROUP BY t.id,t.`name`,t.weight,t.`status`,t4.classification_name ORDER BY t.weight DESC ) AS tt where 1=1
tt.goodsName like '%$goodsName$%'
tt.goodsno like '%$goodsno$%'
ORDER BY tt.weight DESC
